title: Bug 11280 - View Maximization Lost When Switching Perspectives
description: When navigating between perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is not retained.
OB: Upon switching perspectives from Java to Resource and back to Java, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost, reverting to its default size.
EB: The maximized state of the CVS repository view should persist when switching between perspectives. Upon returning to the Java perspective, the view should remain maximized as previously set.
SR:
1. Open the Eclipse IDE in the Java perspective.
2. Navigate to the CVS repository view and double-click the title bar to maximize it.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
4. Return to the Java perspective.
